form.longName: PhenX PX030502 - Alcohol Lifetime Use Disorder
form.preferredDefinition: Measurement of respondent's symptoms of alcohol use disorder. These responses correspond with criteria from the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, Fifth Edition (DSM-5).

question.questionText: In your entire life did you EVER find that your usual number of drinks had much less effect on you than it once did? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinks_less_effect_comparison)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinks_less_effect_comparison_prior_last_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinks_less_effect_comparison_past_year)
Did you have to drink much more to get an effect or drank the equivalent of a fifth of liquor? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinks_less_effect_comparison_consume_more)
In your entire life did you EVER find that you had to drink much more than you once did to get the effect you wanted? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_much_more)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_much_more_prior_last_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_much_more_past_year)
Did you have to drink much more to get an effect or drank the equivalent of a fifth of liquor? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_much_more_past_much_more)

In your entire life did you EVER drink as much as a fifth of liquor in one day, that would be about 20 drinks, or 3 bottles of wine, or as much as 3 six-packs of beer in a single day? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_twenty_drinks)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_twenty_drinks_prior_last_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_twenty_drinks_past_year)
Did you have to drink much more to get an effect or drank the equivalent of a fifth of liquor? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_consume_twenty_drinks_consume_more)
In your entire life did you EVER increase your drinking because the amount you used to drink didn't give you the same effect anymore? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_increase_consumption)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_increase_consumption_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_increase_consumption_prior_last_year)
Did you have to drink much more to get an effect or drank the equivalent of a fifth of liquor? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_increase_consumption_much_more)
In your entire life did you EVER more than once WANT to stop or cut down on your drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_desire_stop_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_desire_stop_drinking_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_desire_stop_drinking_prior_last_year)
Did you want or try to stop or cut down on your drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_desire_stop_drinking_goal)
In your entire life did you EVER more than once TRY to stop or cut down on your drinking but found you couldn't do it? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_failed_stop_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_failed_stop_drinking_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_failed_stop_drinking_prior_last_year)
Did you want or try to stop or cut down on your drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_failed_stop_drinking_goal)
In your entire life did you EVER have a period when you ended up drinking more than you meant to? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_more_than_intended_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_more_than_intended_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_more_than_intended_prior_last_year)
Did you drink more or longer than you meant to? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_more_than_intended_longer)
In your entire life did you EVER have a period when you kept on drinking for longer than you had intended to? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_longer_than_intended_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_longer_than_intended_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_longer_than_intended_prior_last_year)
Did you drink more or longer than you meant to? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_longer_than_intended)
Did you EVER have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_trouble_sleeping_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_trouble_sleeping_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_trouble_sleeping_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder trouble sleeping (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_trouble_sleeping)
Did you EVER find yourself shaking or your hands trembling? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_shaking_trembling_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_shaking_trembling_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_shaking_trembling_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder shaking trembling (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_shaking_trembling)
Did you EVER feel anxious or nervous? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_anxious_nervous_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_anxious_nervous_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_anxious_nervous_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder anxious nervous (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_anxious_nervous)
Did you EVER feel sick to your stomach or vomit (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_vomit_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_vomit_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_vomit_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder sick vomit (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_vomit)
Did you EVER feel more restless than is usual for you? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_restless_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_restless_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_restless_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder restless (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_restless)
Did you EVER find yourself sweating or your heart beating fast? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sweating_heart_beat_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sweating_heart_beat_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sweating_heart_beat_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder sweating heart beat (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sweating_heart_beat)
Did you EVER see, feel, or hear things that weren?really there (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_hallucinations_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_hallucinations_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_hallucinations_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder hallucinations (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_hallucinations)
Did you EVER have fits or seizures? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_seizures_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_seizures_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago?) (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_seizures_prior_last_year)
alcohol lifetime use disorder seizures (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_seizures)
Are at least 2 items marked "Yes" for part B of Q9-16 (Q1.9.2-Q1.16.2)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item)

You just mentioned that you had SOME bad aftereffects when stopping or cutting down on drinking in the last 12 months. Did at least 2 of these experiences happen around the same time DURING the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_after_effects_stop_drinking_past_year)
Are at least 2 items marked Yes" for part C of Q9-16 (Q1.9.3-Q1.16.3)?" (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item2)

You (also/just) mentioned that you had SOME bad aftereffects when stopping or cutting down on drinking before 12 months ago. Did at least 2 of these experiences happen around the same time BEFORE 12 months ago? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_after_effects_stop_drinking_prior_last_year)

In your entire life did you EVER take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, Advil or Tylenol, to GET OVER any of the bad aftereffects of drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_recover_after_effects_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_recover_after_effects_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_recover_after_effects_prior_last_year)
Did you take a drink, medicine or drug to get over or avoid the bad aftereffects of drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_recover_after_effects)

In your entire life did you EVER take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, Advil or Tylenol, to KEEP FROM having any of these bad aftereffects of drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_prevent_after_effects_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_prevent_after_effects_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_prevent_after_effects_prior_last_year)
Did you take a drink, medicine or drug to get over or avoid the bad aftereffects of drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_take_drink_drug_prevent_after_effects)
In your entire life did you EVER have a period when you spent a lot of time drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_time_spent_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_time_spent_drinking_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_time_spent_drinking_prior_last_year)
Did you spend a lot of time drinking or getting over being sick from drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_time_spent_drinking)
In your entire life did you EVER have a period when you spent a lot of time being sick or getting over the bad aftereffects of drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_after_effects_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_after_effects_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_after_effects_prior_last_year)
Did you spend a lot of time drinking or getting over being sick from drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_after_effects)

In your entire life did you EVER give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink??e work, school, or associating with friends or relatives? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_social_impact_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_social_impact_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_social_impact_prior_last_year)
Did you give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_social_impact)

In your entire life did you EVER give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure in order to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_hobbies_impact_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_hobbies_impact_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_hobbies_impact_prior_last_year)
Did you give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_hobbies_impact)

In your entire life did you EVER continue to drink even though you knew it was making you feel depressed, uninterested in things, or suspicious or distrustful of other people? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_depressed_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_depressed_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_depressed_prior_last_year)
Did you drink even though it affected your mood or health? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_depressed)

In your entire life did you EVER continue to drink even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_health_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_health_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_health_prior_last_year)
Did you drink even though it affected your mood or health? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_health)

In your entire life did you EVER continue to drink even though you had experienced a prior blackout, that is, awakened the next day not being able to remember some of the things you did while drinking or after drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_blackout_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_blackout_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_blackout_prior_last_year)
Did you drink even though it affected your mood or health? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_blackout)
In your entire life did you EVER feel a very strong urge or desire to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_strong_desire_drink_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_strong_desire_drink_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_strong_desire_drink_prior_last_year)
Did you have a strong desire or urge to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_strong_desire_drink)
In your entire life did you EVER ant a drink so badly that you couldn't think of anything else? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_preoccupied_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_preoccupied_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_preoccupied_prior_last_year)
Did you have a strong desire or urge to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drink_preoccupied_strong_desire)

In your entire life did you EVER have a period when your drinking or being sick from drinking often interfered with taking care of your home or family? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_family_impact_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_family_impact_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_family_impact_prior_last_year)
Were drunk or hung over when you were supposed to be doing something important? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_sick_family_impact_drunk_hung_over)

In your entire life did you EVER have job or school troubles because of your drinking or being sick from drinking-like missing too much work, not doing your work well, being demoted or losing a job, or being suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_job_school_impact_ever)

Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_job_school_impact_prior_last_year)
Were drunk or hung over when you were supposed to be doing something important? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_job_school_impact_drunk_hung_over)
In your entire life did you EVER continue to drink even though it was causing you problems at school or at work? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_job_school_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_job_school_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_job_school_prior_last_year)
Were drunk or hung over when you were supposed to be doing something important? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_job_school_drunk_hung_over)
In your entire life did you EVER More than once drive a car or other vehicle WHILE you were drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_while_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_while_drinking_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_while_drinking_prior_last_year)
Were in a situation while drinking or after drinking where you could have been hurt? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_while_drinking_safety)

In your entire life did you EVER drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat or other vehicle and have an accident WHILE you were under the influence of alcohol? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_under_influence_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_under_influence_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_under_influence_prior_last_year)
Were in a situation while drinking or after drinking where you could have been hurt? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_under_influence_safety)
In your entire life did you EVER more than once drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle AFTER having too much to drink? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_after_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_after_drinking_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_after_drinking_prior_last_year)
Were in a situation while drinking or after drinking where you could have been hurt? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_driving_after_drinking_safety)

In your entire life did you EVER get into situations while drinking or after drinking that increased your chances of getting hurt-like swimming, using machinery, or walking in a dangerous area or around heavy traffic? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_increased_safety_risk_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_increased_safety_risk_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_increased_safety_risk_prior_last_year)
Were in a situation while drinking or after drinking where you could have been hurt? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_drinking_increased_safety_risk_safety)

Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fighting_spouse_prior_last_year)
Drank even though it affected your relationships with other people? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fighting_spouse_relationship_impact)
In your entire life did you EVER continue to drink even though it was causing you trouble with your family or friends? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_relationship_impact_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_relationship_impact_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_relationship_impact_prior_last_year)
Drank even though it affected your relationships with other people? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_continue_drinking_relationship_impact)
In your entire life did you EVER get into physical fights while drinking or right after drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fights_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fights_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is before last (Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fights_prior_last_year)
Drank even though it affected your relationships with other people? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_fights_relationship_impact)
Are there AT LEAST 2 BOXES marked "Yes" for Q1.1.4-Q1.39.4? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item3)

You mentioned that before 12 months ago, you...(Read ALL summary statements marked in Boxes B1, B2, B3, B4-1, B4-2, B5-B12 in 1, column d). Before last (Month one year ago), was there EVER a period when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time ON AND OFF FOR A FEW MONTHS OR LONGER? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item4)

Before last (Month one year ago), was there EVER a period when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time MOST DAYS FOR AT LEAST A MONTH? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_time_prior_last_year)
Before last (Month one year ago), was there EVER a time when SOME of these experiences happened within the same 1-year period? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_time_prior_last_year_within)
About how old were you the FIRST time SOME of these experiences BEGAN to happen around the same time? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_age_first_time)

In your ENTIRE LIFE, how many separate periods like this did you have when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time? By separate periods, I mean times that were separated by at least 1 year when you EITHER STOPPED drinking entirely (PAUSE) OR you didn't have any of the experiences you mentioned with alcohol at all. (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_number_periods_times)
Is number entered in 2e, 2 or more or unknown? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item5)
What was the LONGEST period you had when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time? Months (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_longest_period_months)
What was the LONGEST period you had when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time? Years (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_longest_period_years)
How old were you the MOST RECENT time SOME of these experiences BEGAN to happen around the same time? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_recent_time_age)
How long did this period last when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time? Months (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_same_time_period_months)
How long did this period last when SOME of these experiences were happening around the same time? Years (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experiences_same_time_period_years)
Is at least 1 item marked in 1b, items (1)-(16), (19)-(27), or (30)-(39)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_check_item6)

About how old were you when you FINALLY STOPPED having these experiences with alcohol? By finally stopped, I mean they never started happening again? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_experienes_stopped_age)
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER ride in a car as a passenger while you were drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_car_passenger_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_car_passenger_drinking_ever_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last(Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_car_passenger_drinking_ever_prior_last_year)

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER drive a car, motorcycle, truck, or other vehicle and injure yourself or someone else in an accident while you were under the influence of alcohol? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_vehicle_injury_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_vehicle_injury_drinking_ever_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last(Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_vehicle_injury_drinking_ever_prior_past_year)

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER accidentally injure yourself or someone else in any way other than motor vehicle accidents, like a bad fall or bad cut, while you were under the influence of alcohol? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_nonvehicle_injury_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_nonvehicle_injury_ever_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last(Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_nonvehicle_injury_ever_prior_last_year)

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER more than once get arrested, held at a police station, or have any other legal problems because of your drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_arrested_drinking_ever)
If yes, did this happen in the last 12 months? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_arrested_drinking_ever_past_year)
Did this happen before 12 months ago, that is, before last(Month one year ago)? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_arrested_drinking_ever_prior_last_year)
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER ride in a car or other vehicle WHILE the driver was drinking? (alcohol_lifetime_use_disorder_passenger_driver_drinking_ever)

form.preferredDefinition: The Study of Use of Products and Exposure-Related Behavior (SUPERB) questionnaire includes a comprehensive list of personal care product questions used to capture the type of product and frequency of use.

protocol.preferredDefinition: The Study of Use of Products and Exposure-Related Behavior (SUPERB) questionnaire includes a comprehensive list of personal care product questions used to capture the type of product and frequency of use.

form.longName: PhenX PX510404 - Substance Abuse And Dependence Past Year Alcohol
form.preferredDefinition: In a face-to-face interview, the respondent is asked several questions about alcohol abuse and dependence during the past 12 months. These responses correspond with criteria from the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, Fifth Edition (DSM-5). The questions encompass marijuana and several prescription and other illicit drug categories.

module.longName: Substance Abuse And Dependence Past Year Alcohol
module.preferredDefinition: Substance Abuse And Dependence Past Year Alcohol

question.questionText: Did you find that your usual number of drinks had much less effect on you than it once did in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drinks_less_effect)
Did you find that you had to drink much more than you once did to get the effect you wanted in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drink_more_same_effect)

Did you drink as much as a fifth of liquor in one day, that would be about 20 drinks, or 3 bottles of wine, or as much as 3 six-packs of beer in a single day in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_twenty_drinks)
Did you increase your drinking because the amount you used to drink didn't give you the same effect anymore in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_increase_drinking_same_effect)
Did you more than once want to stop or cut down on your drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_stop_drinking_multiple_times)
Did you more than once try to stop or cut down on your drinking but found you couldn't do it in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_stop_drinking_multiple_times_fail)
Did you have a period when you ended up drinking more than you meant to in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drinking_more_accidentally)
Did you have a period when you kept on drinking for longer than you had intended to in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drinking_more_than_intended)
Did you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_trouble_sleeping)
Did you find yourself shaking or your hands trembling in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_shaking_trembling)
Did you feel anxious or nervous in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_anxious_nervous)
Did you feel sick to your stomach or vomit when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_sick_vomit)
Did you feel more restless than is usual for you in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_restless)
Did you find yourself sweating or your heart beating fast in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_sweating_heart_beating)
Did you see, feel, or hear things that weren't really there when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_hallucination)
Did you have fits or seizures in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_fits_seizures)
Are at least 2 items marked "Yes" in column b items 9-16 (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_item_check)

You just mentioned that you had SOME bad aftereffects when stopping or cutting down on drinking in the last 12 months. Did at least 2 of these experiences happen around the same time DURING the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_after_effects_stop_drinking)

Did you take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, advil or tylenol, to get over any of the bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_after_effects_recover_drugs)

Did you take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, advil or tylenol, to keep from having any of these bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_after_effects_prevention_drugs)
Did you have a period when you spent a lot of time drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_period_drinking_excessively)

Did you have a period when you spent a lot of time being sick or getting over the bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_sick_recovering_after_effects_drinking)

Did you give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink-like work, school, or associating with friends or relatives in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_social_impact_drinking)
Did you give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure in order to drink in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_hobbies_impact_drinking)

Did you continue to drink even though you knew it was making you feel depressed, uninterested in things, or suspicious or distrustful of other people in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_continue_drinking_depressed)

Did you continue to drink even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_continue_drinking_health)

Did you continue to drink even though you had experienced a prior blackout, that is, awakened the next day not being able to remember some of the things you did while drinking or after drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_continue_drinking_blackout)
Did you feel a very strong urge or desire to drink in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_desire_stop_drinking)
Did you want a drink so badly that you couldn't think of anything else in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_preoccupied_drinking)

Did you have a period when your drinking or being sick from drinking often interfered with taking care of your home or family in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_family_impact_drinking)

Did you have job or school troubles because of your drinking or being sick from drinking-like missing too much work, not doing your work well, being demoted or losing a job, or being suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_job_school_drinking)
Did you continue to drink even though it was causing you problems at school or at work in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_continue_drinking_school_work)
Did you more than once drive a car or other vehicle while you were drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drive_car_drinking)

Did you drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle and have an accident while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_vehicle_accident_under_influence)

Did you more than once drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle after having too much to drink in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_vehicle_accident_alcohol_multiple_times)

Did you get into situations while drinking or after drinking that increased your chances of getting hurt-like swimming, using machinery, or walking in a dangerous area or around heavy traffic in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_safety_risk_drinking)
Did you have arguments or problems with your spouse or partner or family or friends because of your drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_spouse_fight_drinking)
Did you continue to drink even though it was causing you trouble with your family or friends in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_continue_drinking_family_impact)
Did you get into physical fights while drinking or right after drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_fight_drinking)
Did you ride in a car as a passenger while you were drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_passenger_car_drinking)

Did you drive a car, motorcycle, truck, or other vehicle and injure yourself or someone else in an accident while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_vehicle_accident_alcohol)

Did you accidentally injure yourself or someone else in any way other than motor vehicle accidents, like a bad fall or bad cut, while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_vehicle_accident_injury)

Did you more than once get arrested, held at a police station, or have any other legal problems because of your drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_arrested_multple_times_drinking)
Did you ride in a car or other vehicle while the driver was drinking in the last 12 months? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_passenger_car_driver_drinking)
How old were you when you FIRST used sedatives or tranquilizers? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_age_first_time)
Did you use sedatives or tranquilizers in the last 12 months only, before the last 12 months only, or during both time periods? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_history)
During the last 12 months, about how often did you use sedatives or tranquilizers? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_frequency)
When was the most recent time you used sedatives or tranquilizers? Days (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_history_recent_days)
When was the most recent time you used sedatives or tranquilizers? Weeks (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_history_recent_weeks)
When was the most recent time you used sedatives or tranquilizers? Months (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_history_recent_months)
When was the most recent time you used sedatives or tranquilizers? Years (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_history_recent_years)

Think about the time when you were using sedatives or tranquilizers the MOST. At that time about how often did you use (it??m)? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_highest_frequency)
About how old were you when you FIRST BEGAN using sedatives or tranquilizers that frequently? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_highest_frequency_age)

About how long did that period last when you were using sedatives or tranquilizers that frequently? (If less than 1 week enter 1 week) (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_highest_frequency_period_weeks)
About how long did that period last when you were using sedatives or tranquilizers that frequently? Months (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_highest_frequency_period_months)
About how long did that period last when you were using sedatives or tranquilizers that frequently? Years (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_sedatives_use_highest_frequency_period_years)
What is the time period marked in 2b for marijuana? When did respondent use marijuana? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_respondent_marijuana)
How old were you when you FIRST used painkillers? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_painkillers_age_first_time)

During the last 12 months, about how often did you use painkillers? (substance_abuse_dependence_past_year_drugs_painkillers_use_frequency)

protocol.longName: Substance Abuse and Dependence - Past Year - Alcohol
protocol.preferredDefinition: In a face-to-face interview, the respondent is asked several questions about alcohol abuse and dependence during the past 12 months. These responses correspond with criteria from the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, Fifth Edition (DSM-5). The questions encompass marijuana and several prescription and other illicit drug categories.

form.preferredDefinition: An interviewer-administered assessment that focuses on a respondent's medical status, employment and support, drug use, alcohol use, legal status, family/social status, and psychiatric status to determine a respondent's level of stability and understand life events that contribute to alcohol and drug dependency.

protocol.preferredDefinition: An interviewer-administered assessment that focuses on a respondent's medical status, employment and support, drug use, alcohol use, legal status, family/social status, and psychiatric status to determine a respondent's level of stability and understand life events that contribute to alcohol and drug dependency.

form.longName: PhenX PX660701 - Family History Multiple Mental Disorders
form.preferredDefinition: The Family Interview for Genetic Studies (FIGS) is a tool used by a trained interviewer to collect information about biological relatives of the subject who has a mental disorder. The interview is conducted with the relatives themselves and not through the subject. There are three parts to the FIGS. The General Screening Questions gather general information about all known relatives. The Face Sheet is completed for each of the first-degree relatives and any affected relatives. There are various Symptom Checklists, one for each mental disorder: depression, mania, alcohol/drug abuse, psychosis, and paranoid/schizoid/schizotypal personality.

Does he/she often keep an eye out to stop people from taking advantage of him/her? Expects, without sufficient basis, to be exploited/harmed by others. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_exploitation)

Does he/she get concerned that friends or co-workers are not really loyal or trustworthy? Questions, without justification, loyalty of friends or associates. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_loyalty)

Does he/she often pick up hidden threats or put-downs from what people say or do? Reads hidden demeaning or threatening meanings into benign remarks or events. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_interpretation)
Does he/she take a long time to forgive someone if they have insulted or hurt him/her? Bears grudges or unforgiving of insults/slights. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_grudges)

Does he/she seem to believe it is best not to let other people know much about him/her? Reluctant to confide in others because of unwarranted fear that information will be used against him/her. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_trust)
Does he/she often get angry about being insulted or slighted? Easily slighted, quick to react with anger or counterattack. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_anger)

Does he/she seem to be a jealous person? Ever suspected that his/her spouse/partner was unfaithful? Questions, without justification, fidelity of spouse or sexual partner. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_paranoid_jealousy)

Does he/she seem not to want or enjoy close relationships, like with family or friends? Neither desires nor enjoys close relationships, including family. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_relationship)
Does he/she prefer to do things alone rather than with other people? Almost always chooses solitary activities. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_loner)

Does he/she hardly ever seem to have strong feelings, like being very angry or very happy? Rarely, if ever, claims or appears to experience strong emotions, anger/joy. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_emotions)

Does he/she seem uninterested in being sexually involved with another person? Little if any desire to have sexual experiences with another person (age taken into account). (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_sexuality)
Does he/she seem not to care if people praise or criticize him/her? Indifferent to praise and criticism from others. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_praise)

Does he/she have no one to be really close to or confide in, or just one person, outside of the immediate family? No close friends or confidants, or only one, other than first-degree relatives. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_confide)

Does he/she act cold or distant, hardly ever smile or nod back at people? Constricted affect, aloof, cold, rarely reciprocates gestures or expressions. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizoid_interactions)

Does he/she wonder if people talking to each other are talking about him/her? Say that a common event or object is a special sign for him/her? Ideas of reference (not delusions of reference). (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_paranoid)
Does he/she often act nervous in a group of unfamiliar people? Excessive social anxiety. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_nercous)

Does he/she reports experiences with the supernatural? Believe in astrology, seeing the future, UFOs, ESP or a sixth sense? Odd beliefs or magical thinking, influencing behavior and inconsistent with subcultural norms. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_supernatural)

Does he/she mistake objects or shadows for people, or noises for voices? Have a sense that some invisible person or force is around? See faces change before his/her eyes? Unusual perceptual experiences. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_perception)

Does he/she behave in odd or eccentric ways? Look peculiar or untidy, have unusual mannerisms, talk to him/herself? Odd, eccentric, peculiar behavior or appearance. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_behavior)

Does he/she sometimes make it hard to follow what he/she is saying? Ramble off the subject, talk in vague or abstract terms? Odd speech (without loosened associations or incoherence). (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_focus)

Does he/she sometimes act silly, not in keeping with the situation? Or tend not to show any feelings in response to people? Inappropriate or constricted affect (e.g., silly or aloof). (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_schizotypal_composure)

Does he/she have problems because of this behavior or thinking or feelingeither with the family or socially, or at work or school? Significant social or occupational impairment. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_impairment_interaction)
Does this behavior or thinking or feeling cause the person unhappiness? Significant subjective distress. (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_impairment_distress)
Interviewer judgement on reliability of this information: (familyhistory_mentaldisorders_impairment_interviewer_judgement)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The Family Interview for Genetic Studies (FIGS) is a tool used by a trained interviewer to collect information about biological relatives of the subject who has a mental disorder. The interview is conducted with the relatives themselves and not through the subject. There are three parts to the FIGS. The General Screening Questions gather general information about all known relatives. The Face Sheet is completed for each of the first-degree relatives and any affected relatives. There are various Symptom Checklists, one for each mental disorder: depression, mania, alcohol/drug abuse, psychosis, and paranoid/schizoid/schizotypal personality.

form.longName: PhenX PX660801 - Premorbid Adjustment In Psychosis
form.preferredDefinition: The Modified Cannon-Spoor Premorbid Adjustment Scale (PAS) is an interviewer-administered rating scale that assesses functioning levels in four major areas of the subject's life: social accessibility-isolation, peer relationships, ability to function outside the nuclear family, and capacity to form intimate socio-sexual ties. The scale is divided into four life period sections. The life period sections are Childhood (6-11 years), Early Adolescence (12-15 years), Late Adolescence (16-18 years), and Adulthood (19 years and up). Each section of the scale contains several items that are scored on a Likert-type scale of 0-6, where lower numbers indicate normal, healthy functioning and higher numbers suggest abnormal development. The protocol measures only premorbid functioning, which is considered as the period ending 12 months before psychotic symptoms.

protocol.preferredDefinition: The Modified Cannon-Spoor Premorbid Adjustment Scale (PAS) is an interviewer-administered rating scale that assesses functioning levels in four major areas of the subject's life: social accessibility-isolation, peer relationships, ability to function outside the nuclear family, and capacity to form intimate socio-sexual ties. The scale is divided into four life period sections. The life period sections are Childhood (6-11 years), Early Adolescence (12-15 years), Late Adolescence (16-18 years), and Adulthood (19 years and up). Each section of the scale contains several items that are scored on a Likert-type scale of 0-6, where lower numbers indicate normal, healthy functioning and higher numbers suggest abnormal development. The protocol measures only premorbid functioning, which is considered as the period ending 12 months before psychotic symptoms.
